https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oWRbbb2QbH8lcEqH53pcAvSC8r4.jpg The first authorized biography of Christopher Wallace, allowing Christopher to narrate his own life story. Using archival footage and previously unknown audio to tell the story along with interviews with those that knew him the best. Biggie: The Life of Notorious B.I.G.
